data.message: Hi I would like to take my wife, daughters both 10 and son 9 to go on Sunday 10th  to see our favourite Ed Sheeran, Taylor Swift. This would just be amazing day out and would make it a very special Christmas   This would be an amazing treat for us seeing as we don't get to do anything like this and have not had a very good end of the year so far#CapitalJBB  #CapitalFM #CocaCola #edsheeran #louisajohnson #jinglebellball thank you for the chance to win this
